articles.title: Senior Party and State Officials Visit Kumsusan Memorial Palace
articles.content:
Senior Party and State Officials Visit Kumsusan Memorial Palace

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces institutions, ministries and national institutions Monday visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung on the 66th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Laid before the statue of Kim Il Sung was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 The participants paid their respect for Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They bowed in humble reverence to Kim Il Sung who developed the WPK into a powerful guiding force of the revolution and an invincible vanguard organization.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons, working people and school youth and children across the country visited statues of President Kim Il Sung in their residential places to lay floral baskets, bouquets and flowers on the 66th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 Floral baskets were laid before the statues of the President at Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of People's Security, Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace and different other parts of the city. They were from party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, units of scientific, educational, culture and art, public health and media fields, factories, enterprises, schools, etc. 
					
					 The visitors made bows before statues of the President in humble reverence.

articles.title: Dancing Parties Celebrate WPK Anniversary
articles.content:
Dancing Parties Celebrate WPK Anniversary

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students were held Monday in Korea on the 66th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The plazas of the Party Founding Memorial Tower, the Arch of Triumph, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and other dancing places were crowded with youth and students.
					
					 Songs "Let's Sing of Our Pride in Being under the Guidance of the General", "Please Receive the Best Wishes of People" and "Do Prosper, Era of the Workers' Party" resounded through the dancing grounds.
					
					 The young people danced to the tune of songs reflecting their thanks to general secretary Kim Jong Il who is glorifying the WPK as the eternal party of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Songs "It's the Pride of Our Party" and "I'll Dedicate My Youth to Country" added to the festive mood.
					
					 The dancers enthusiastically danced with the will to fully demonstrate the dignified appearances of young vanguard in the advance for a great surge for the improvement of people's living.
					
					 Similar dancing parties were held in different places including Phyongsong of South Phyongan Province, Hamhung of South Hamgyong Province and Wonsan of Kangwon Province.

articles.title: Performances Celebrate WPK Anniversary
articles.content:
Performances Celebrate WPK Anniversary

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Performances were given at the central and local theatres to celebrate the 66th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The Mansudae Art Troupe and the State Folk Art Troupe gave concerts at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre, the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre and the orchestra of the Yun I Sang Music Institute at the Yun I Sang Concert Hall in the city.
					
					 Put on the stages were colorful numbers including female solo "We Always Remember All Sorts of Hardships Undergone by the Leader", violin and orchestra "Oh, We Yearn for" and orchestra "Our General Is the Best". 
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang of the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung, founder and builder of the WPK, and general secretary Kim Jong Il who developed the party into the guide of the Songun revolution.
					
					 The light comedy "Echo of Mountain", winner of Kim Il Sung Prize, was given at the National Theatre.
					
					 The performers impressively showed the noble spiritual world and the indomitable fighting traits of the people in the Chollima era who turned the great plan of the party into a reality.
					
					 A performance given at the Moranbong Circus Theatre, too, gave optimism and joy to the citizens spending the meaningful holiday.
					
					 There were also performances at the local theatres including those in South Phyongan Province, North Hamgyong Province and Kangwon Province.
					
					 They vividly showed the iron faith and will of the Korean people to vehemently advance to the bright future under the leadership of the great party.

articles.title: Performance of Entrants of Art Contest Schoolchildren Held
articles.content:
Performance of Entrants of Art Contest Schoolchildren Held 
						

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A performance of entrants of the 6th schoolchildren's individual art contest took place at Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace on Monday on the 66th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers including male solo "We are happy under the care of Marshal Kim Il Sung," xylophone solo "General and children," serial folk songs "Thank you, party," accordion solo "My classmates," solo dance "Dance with Janggo" and trio "We will always follow the party".
					
					 The performers impressively portrayed the ardent yearning for Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and praised general secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience. 
					
					 Enjoying it were Ri Yong Su, department director of the WPK Central Committee, Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the Central Committee of the youth league, and others.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun WPK Will Always Shine as Kim Il Sung's Party
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun WPK Will Always Shine as Kim Il Sung's Party

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Papers today in editorials dedicated to the 66th birthday of the WPK said the Workers' Party of Korea will always shine as the party of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun said that the WPK blazed a new trail for the construction of the revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The WPK is the only party in the world which constantly adheres to its idea and true nature as they were at the time of its foundation.
					
					 It has greeted the golden days of its development under the leadership of Kim Jong Il. It is his greatest exploit in accomplishing the Juche cause that he developed the WPK into a great guiding force of Songun revolution and put the single-minded unity among the leader, party, army and the people on a new higher stage.
					
					 The WPK conference last year fully showed before the world that the WPK has secured a fundamental guarantee for the accomplishment of the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The WPK has taken up its appearance as the party of Kim Il Sung in terms of ideology and sense of organization as well as the leadership mode and the relations with the popular masses.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are convinced of the bright future of socialist Korea and the new great victory of the Juche revolution in the dignified appearance of the WPK led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Minju Joson called for advancing to the prosperity of socialism under the leadership of the great party.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung University Delegation Leaves for Mongolia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung University Delegation Leaves for Mongolia

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Kim Il Sung University headed by President Song Ja Rip, chairman of the DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Parliamentary Group who doubles as minister of Higher Education, left here Monday for Mongolia.

articles.title: Founder of WPK
articles.content:
Founder of WPK

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- October 10 marks the anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), which guides the Korean people to always emerge victorious.
					
					 The WPK was founded by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					From the early period of his revolutionary activities he had made preparations to found a political party to guide the Korean revolution successfully, seeking a unique way of party founding.
					
					 He formed the first party organization -- the Society for Rallying Comrades -- in Kalun in early July Juche 19 (1930) and, based on it, trained hardcore elements and built up an organization backbone for party founding. 
					
					 He also laid ideological foundations for founding a revolutionary party of Juche type, ensuring the purity and ideological unity of the revolutionary ranks.
					
					 During the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, Kim Il Sung rallied broad masses under the banner of the anti-Japanese struggle, consolidating the mass foundations for party founding.
					
					 On the basis of the solid organizational and ideological foundations laid in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, he proclaimed the founding of the party in 1945.
					
					 The WPK founding was a victory of Kim Il Sung's immortal Juche idea and his independent policy of party founding based on the idea. 
					
					 The WPK, under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, has developed into a powerful political organization triumphantly guiding the Korean people's struggle for defending the sovereignty of the country and accelerating socialist construction.

articles.title: Suppression of Trade Unions Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Trade Unions Protested in S. Korea

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The Confederation of Trade Unions of south Korea held a rally in Seoul on Friday in denunciation of the puppet authorities' crackdown on trade unions.
					
					 Speakers condemned the authorities for indiscriminate lay-off and suppression of trade unions.
					
					 All the people, pushed to the brink of a cliff in life, are carrying on the struggle against the "government" and capital, they said.
					
					 Only solidarity is a way out, they said, declaring that the workers would pool their efforts to continue the struggle to the last without yielding to the repression.
					
					 They called for frustrating the present regime's suppression and defending the trade unions.

articles.title: Unreasonable Conclusion of FTA Flayed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Unreasonable Conclusion of FTA Flayed in S. Korea 

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held a press conference outside the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade Friday to disclose the unreasonable nature of the Free Trade Agreement with the U.S.
					
					 A press release was read out after a speech at the press conference. 
					
					 It said the assistant secretary of State for East Asian and Pacific Affairs of the U.S. would visit south Korea to discuss the issue of the conclusion of the FTA. 
					
					 The FTA is full of such poisonous clauses as opening of south Korean market of beef and farm products, the press release said, and went on:
					
					 The injustice of the FTA is clearly proved by 55 unequal clauses in the agreement harmful to south Korea. 
					
					 If the FTA is concluded, the economy of south Korea would be more dependent on the U.S. and the life of the people deteriorated. 
					
					 The chief executive is demanding the "National Assembly" pass the motion calling for the ratification of a proposal on the FTA timed to coincide with his U.S. visit. 
					
					 The press release bitterly denounced the authorities' sycophantic behavior representing the interests of the U.S. only.

articles.title: Suppression of Journalists under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Trade Unions Protested in S. Korea

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The Confederation of Trade Unions of south Korea held a rally in Seoul on Friday in denunciation of the puppet authorities' crackdown on trade unions.
					
					 Speakers condemned the authorities for indiscriminate lay-off and suppression of trade unions.
					
					 All the people, pushed to the brink of a cliff in life, are carrying on the struggle against the "government" and capital, they said.
					
					 Only solidarity is a way out, they said, declaring that the workers would pool their efforts to continue the struggle to the last without yielding to the repression.
					
					 They called for frustrating the present regime's suppression and defending the trade unions.

articles.title: Americans Oppose Construction of Naval Base on Jeju Island
articles.content:
Americans Oppose Construction of Naval Base on Jeju Island

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- An American peace activist and a professor of Massachuset Engineering College contributed an article about the construction of a U.S. naval base on Jeju Island of south Korea to the south Korean newspaper Hangyore. 
					
					 In the article they said the naval base would be used for putting into practice the U.S. missile defense system and as advance base for hurling forces into surrounding countries. 
					
					 They see no need to build such a base, they said. 
					
					 Noting that the struggle of the Jeju islanders against the base construction is aimed to prevent a war, they voiced support for it. 
					
					 It is important to explore a way of helping the islanders, they stressed.

articles.title: Russia Seeks Rearmament of Army
articles.content:
Russia Seeks Rearmament of Army 

					 Moscow, October 9 (KCNA) -- Russia's prime minister called for the rearmament of the army. 
					
					 Speaking at an investment forum held recently, Vladimir Putin said the rearmament is conductive to ensuring the country's security and overall economic development. 
					
					 Noting that Russia will allot 20 trillion Rbl to the technical rearmament of the army, he said the figure is less than the U.S. military expenditure several times higher than a total of other developed countries' military funds.  
					
					 "We do not take the country's militarization as our goal. What we are seeking is a technical rearmament," he added.

articles.title: Iranian Nation Stands against Oppression
articles.content:
Iranian Nation Stands against Oppression

					 Tehran, October 9 (KCNA) -- President of Iran Mahmoud Ahmadinejad said Thursday at the people's gathering in Malayer that the Iranian nation will stand against any oppression. 
					
					 "Today like the past 32 years since the 1979 Islamic Revolution, the enemies are trying in vain to create obstacles on the Iranian nations' way to achievement," said the President, adding that the nation will turn the hegemonic powers' dreams into ashes.

articles.title: Kazakhstan May Have Nuclear Power Plant in a Decade
articles.content:
Kazakhstan May Have Nuclear Power Plant in a Decade

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Kazakhstan may have a nuclear power plant within the next 10 years, an official from the state-owned nuclear power firm Kazatomprom said Wednesday.
					
					 "In the near future we need to identify the role and place of nuclear power in the country's energy balance, determine the locations for nuclear power plants (NPP), choose the best nuclear technology, primarily, in terms of safety," the company's deputy head told the 6th Eurasian Kazenergy Forum.
					
					 The Kazakh government first revealed its intent to construct a NPP near Lake Balkhash in 1998.

articles.title: Indian Border Forces Seize Heroin
articles.content:
Indian Border Forces Seize Heroin

					 New Delhi, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Border Security Force (BSF) of India on Oct. 4 and 6 seized nearly 15 kg and 27 kg of heroin from near the India-Pakistan border.
					This is result of efforts directed by the country to the anti-drug campaign.

articles.title: BBC Set to Cut 2,000 Jobs by 2017
articles.content:
BBC Set to Cut 2,000 Jobs by 2017 

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The BBC is planning to cut 2,000 jobs and radically change programming in order to cut 20% from its budget over the next five years.

articles.title: Anti-War Protesters March in U.S.
articles.content:
Anti-War Protesters March in U.S.
						

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A couple of hundred U.S. veterans and protesters on Friday marched to the Martin Luther King Jr. Memorial in Washington D.C., marking the 10th anniversary of the invasion of Afghanistan.
					
					 The protestors strongly pleaded the government to stop the war and bring troops home, shouting slogans against war.

articles.title: U.S. Jobless Figure Increases
articles.content:
U.S. Jobless Figure Increases

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Labor Department on Oct. 6 said that the advance figure for seasonally adjusted initial claims for jobless benefits was 401,000 in the week ending Oct. 1, marking an increase of 6,000 from the previous week's revised figure.

articles.title: Motherly Party Responsible for Destiny of People
articles.content:
Motherly Party Responsible for Destiny of People

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The song "We Sing of the Party" has become increasingly popular in the DPRK with the approach of the 66th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 The song stresses that the WPK is the greatest party pursuing politics based on love for the people.
					
					 The WPK's is a history of love for the people.
					
					The revolutionary party should take care of the popular masses and protect and guide them, responsible for their destiny, as the mother does for her children -- this is the guidelines general secretary Kim Jong Il has always maintained in party building.
					
					 When visiting the newly built Pothonggang Shop in August Juche 98 (2009), he asked officials accompanying him whether there was an elevator in the shop.
					
					 They said that the design expected no elevator because the shop was just a two-storied building. Listening to them, Kim Jong Il suggested installing an elevator for the convenience of customers.
					
					 He then said the convenience of the people should be put above anything else in all work.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's ceaseless field guidance tours are all aimed to improve the people's living standard.
					
					 The Korean people, through their practical experience, well know that the WPK guided by Kim Jong Il is the motherly party wholly responsible for their destiny and future.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Victims of U.S. Terrorism Held in Cuba
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Victims of U.S. Terrorism Held in Cuba

					 Havana, October 9 (KCNA) -- A memorial service for victims of U.S. state-sponsored terrorism was held at the Anti-imperialist Tribunal in Havana on October 5. 
					
					 The event was attended by hundreds of people. 
					
					 The participants mourned thousands of people killed by U.S. terrorist activities since the Cuban revolution's victory in January 1959. 
					
					 They strongly urged the U.S. administration to immediately release five Cuban patriots who have been kept in a U.S. prison for more than a decade.

articles.title: WPK Anniversary Marked in Bulgaria
articles.content:
WPK Anniversary Marked in Bulgaria

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association issued Bulletin No. 5 on the 66th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The bulletin carried an article titled "66th Founding Anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea." It said that President Kim Il Sung directed big efforts to building the party, the army and the state after Korea's liberation, adding he founded the WPK on Oct. 10, 1945.
					
					 The WPK is a popular party which groups progressive fighters of different strata including workers, farmers and intellectuals, it noted.
					
					 Another article titled "West Sea Barrage" said the DPRK built the 8 km barrage in the wild sea in just five years in the 1980s.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter from AINDF Central Committee
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter from AINDF Central Committee

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- General secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory message from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Monday, the 66th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					
					 The founding of the WPK by President Kim Il Sung was the birth of a revolutionary party of new type guided by the Juche idea and a great event which gave a new origin to the national history, the letter said, adding:
					
					 The great revolutionary feats the President performed before the times and history by making an immortal contribution to the development of the WPK will shine long with the annuals of its shining victory.
					
					 Noting that the WPK has greeted the most brilliant heyday of its development under the guidance of Kim Jong Il, the great leader, the message highly praised the immortal feats he has performed in developing the Party into a prestigious revolutionary party.
					
					 He provided the historic June 15 joint declaration and its action programme, October 4 declaration, out of his ardent patriotism and broad magnanimity and energetically guided the movement for achieving the country's independent reunification through the effort of the Korean nation, it said, and went on:
					
					 His visits to China and Russia this year were landmark events for boosting international solidarity, developing traditional friendly relations among countries and defending global peace and security.
					
					 The AINDF could grow to be a patriotic vanguard guided by the immortal Juche idea and an invincible organization steering the movement of the people of different circles for independence, democracy and reunification.
					
					 It will declare a total failure of the anti-DPRK confrontation policy pursued by the pro-U.S. conservative forces and bring about a crucial phase of national reunification without fail by making strenuous efforts to implement the above-said declarations, a full embodiment of his idea and line of national reunification.

articles.title: Korean Film Shows Mark WPK Anniversary
articles.content:
Korean Film Shows Mark WPK Anniversary

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Film shows took place in Romania, the Czech Republic, Nigeria, Indonesia and Thailand from Sept. 29 to Oct. 4 on the 66th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 85th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					
					 Films shown included "The Tower of the Juche Idea" and "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation."
					
					 A general director under the Ministry of Water Resources of Nigeria said the fireworks are spectacular, noting they reflect the feature of the Korean people rallied close around general secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Fireworks of victory and glory would be displayed on the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, he stressed.
					
					 The director of a Thai company said that he was deeply impressed by the tireless efforts of Kim Jong Il who has successfully carried forward the cause of the President.
					
					 Socialism in the DPRK would surely triumph as it is wisely led by Kim Jong Il, he stressed.

articles.title: Reminiscences Carried by German Paper
articles.content:
Reminiscences Carried by German Paper

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- A German paper in its October issue carried the gist of "Charter 10 With Faith in Independence" of Vol. 4 of Part 1 Anti-Japanese Revolution of President Kim Il Sung's reminiscences "With the Century".
					
					 It also carried the photo of the President.

articles.title: WPK Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
WPK Praised by Foreigners

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Seminars, round-table talks, photo-exhibitions and film shows took place in Uganda, Bangladesh and Iran on Oct. 3 and 4 on the 66th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 The chairman of the Kampala City Committee of the Uganda National Resistance Movement at the seminar said that the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung has developed into a tested and seasoned party under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK became a great country no one dares provoke and its people the most dignified people in the world as all of them are rallied close around the powerful party, he noted.
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, advisor of the Bangladesh Barisal Society for the Study of Songun Policy, said that the history of the WPK is precisely a great revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung and a glorious history in which a trail was blazed in building a revolutionary party in the era of independence and good example was set under his leadership.
					
					 The President's idea and theory of party building clearly indicate the principles and ways to be applied and implemented in building a workers' party and conducting its activities, he stressed, adding:
					
					 The WPK will always shine as the party of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: WPK Anniversary Marked Abroad
articles.content:
WPK Anniversary Marked Abroad

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- Indonesian and Peruvian officials made public statements on Oct. 3 on the 66th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 85th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					
					 Ristiyanto, secretary general of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, said the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung is a revolutionary party of Juche type enjoying absolute support and trust from the Korean people.
					
					 Its history is one of revolutionary activities of Kim Il Sung and, at the same time, that of the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, he noted, stressing:
					
					 The WPK led by Kim Jong Il will always shine as the party of the President.
					
					 The secretary general of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism said that the WPK is demonstrating its might as a vanguard unit of the world revolution.
					
					 It has foiled the imperialists' moves to stifle socialist Korea and all hues of anti-revolutionary ideological tendencies and firmly maintained the revolutionary principle, he noted, adding the reality clearly proves what a proper option the WPK has taken.
					
					 Wahid Al Uksouri, chairman of the Arab Socialist Party of Egypt, also issued statement on Oct. 5 on the 66th anniversary of the WPK.

articles.title: Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Work Off Press in Russia

					 Pyongyang, October 10 (KCNA) -- General secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Establishing the Juche Outlook on the Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Russian Association for Development of Friendship and Cooperation with Foreign Countries.
					
					 The work, published on Oct. 10, Juche 76 (1987), clarifies the essence of the Juche outlook on the revolution and its composition and the tasks for firmly establishing it.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place on Oct. 4.

articles.title: Cuadros rinden tributo a Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Cuadros rinden tributo a Kim Il Sung

					 Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 66o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo y los funcionarios de los organos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organismos centrales  visitaron el dia 10 el Palacio Memorial Kumsusan.
					
					 Fue depositado ante la estatua del Presidente un cesto de flores a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Comite de Defensa Nacional, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					 Los participantes rindieron tributo ahi al Presidente quien fortalecio el PTC como una poderosa fuerza directiva de la revolucion y una invencible organizacion vanguardista.

articles.title: Funciones artisticas por dia de fundacion del PTC
articles.content:
Funciones artisticas por dia de fundacion del PTC 

					 Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar en los teatros del centro y localidades las funciones dedicadas al 66o aniversario de la  fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					 En el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este se ofrecio el concierto del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae y el Conjunto Nacional de Arte Tradicional, en el Teatro Moranbong, el de la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional, y en la Casa de Musica Yun I Sang, el de la orquesta del Instituto de Musica Yun I Sang. 
					
					 En las escenas se pusieron el solo femenino "No olvidamos los sufrimientos del Lider", la musica orquestal acompanada de violin "Oh, anoramos" y la musica orquestal "Nuestro General es el mejor" y otras piezas.
					
					  Los ejecutantes alabaron en tono patetico las imborrables proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung, fundador y constructor del PTC, y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien lo desarrollo como orientador de la revolucion del Songun. 
					
					 En tanto, tuvo lugar en el Teatro Nacional de Drama la funcion de la comedia ligera "Eco de la Montana", obra condecorada con el Premio Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Los ejecutantes mostraron emocionantemente el noble mundo espiritual y el indoblegable temperamento de lucha de las personas de la epoca de Chollima quienes llevaron a la realidad el gran proposito del partido.
					
					 La funcion ofrecida en el Circo Moranbong dio la alegria y el optimismo a los capitalinos. 
					
					 Tuvieron lugar tambien las funciones festivas en los teatros de las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur, Hamgyong del Norte, Kangwon y otras localidades. 
					
					 Las funciones mostraron bien la ferrea conviccion y voluntad del pueblo coreano de avanzar a pasos firmes hacia el radiante futuro, siguiendo al gran partido.

articles.title: Jovenes y estudiantes celebran dia de fundacion del PTC
articles.content:
Jovenes y estudiantes celebran dia de fundacion del PTC 

					 Pyongyang, 10 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 10 en distintas localidades del pais los bailes de los jovenes y estudiantes por el 66o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					 En las explanadas frente al Monumento a la Fundacion del Partido, el Arco de Triunfo, el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang y otros lugares de la capital resonaron las melodias de canciones "Cantemos el orgullo de tener al General", "Que reciba la felicitacion del pueblo" y "!Que prospere la epoca del Partido del Trabajo!". 
					
					 Los jovenes y estudiantes bailaron expresando el sentimiento de agradecimiento al Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien glorifica el PTC como eterno partido del Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 El ambiente festivo se avivo cuando resonaban las canciones "Orgullo de nuestro partido" y "Dedicare mi juventud a la patria". 
					
					 Los participantes bailaron con la decision de manifestar sin reservas el poderio de la vanguardia juvenil en la marcha de gran auge por la mejora de las condiciones de vida del pueblo. 
					
					 Este dia, los jovenes y estudiantes de Phyongsong de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur, Hamhung de la de Hamgyong del Sur, Wonsan de la de Kangwon y otras localidades tambien realizaron actos similares para celebrar significativamente la misma efemeride.
